<<<<<<< HEAD
A firebrand pluckt out of the burning. A sermon preached at Margarets Westminster, before the Honourable House of Commons, at their late solemn fast, Novemb. 27. 1644. By Benjamin Pickering, Minister of Gods Word at Buckstead in Sussex: and a member of the Assembly of Divines. Published by order of the said house. Pickering, Benjamin.
[8], 28 p.
Printed by I. L. for Philemon Stephens, and Samuel Gellibrand in Pauls Church-yard, London : 1645[ie 1644]
Annotation on Thomason copy: the 5 in imprint date is crossed out and altered to 1644. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
